properties.Description: Describes the properties of a SAP monitor.

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

provisioningState.Description: State of provisioning of the monitor.

appLocation.Description: The monitor resources will be deployed in the monitoring region. The subnet region should be same as the monitoring region.

routingPreference.Description: Sets the routing preference of the monitor. By default only RFC1918 traffic is routed to the customer VNET.

logAnalyticsWorkspaceArmId.Description: The ARM ID of the Log Analytics Workspace that is used for monitoring.

monitorSubnet.Description: The subnet which the SAP monitor will be deployed in

msiArmId.Description: The ARM ID of the MSI used for monitoring.

details.Description: Array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

innerError.Description: Object containing more specific information than  the current object about the error.

details.Description: Array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

innerError.Description: Object containing more specific information than  the current object about the error.

createdBy.Description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.Description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedAt.Description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

properties.Description: Describes the properties of a provider instance.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

provisioningState.Description: State of provisioning of the monitor.

providerSettings.Description: Gets or sets the provider specific properties.

details.Description: Array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

innerError.Description: Object containing more specific information than  the current object about the error.

hostname.Description: Gets or sets the target virtual machine name.

dbName.Description: Gets or sets the db2 database name.

dbPort.Description: Gets or sets the db2 database sql port.

dbUsername.Description: Gets or sets the db2 database user name.

dbPassword.Description: Gets or sets the db2 database password.

dbPasswordUri.Description: Gets or sets the key vault URI to secret with the database password.

sapSid.Description: Gets or sets the SAP System Identifier

providerType.Description: The provider type. For example, the value can be SapHana.

hostname.Description: Gets or sets the SQL server host name.

dbPort.Description: Gets or sets the database sql port.

dbUsername.Description: Gets or sets the database user name.

dbPassword.Description: Gets or sets the database password.

dbPasswordUri.Description: Gets or sets the key vault URI to secret with the database password.

sapSid.Description: Gets or sets the SAP System Identifier

providerType.Description: The provider type. For example, the value can be SapHana.

prometheusUrl.Description: URL of the Node Exporter endpoint.

hostname.Description: Gets or sets the target machine name.

sid.Description: Gets or sets the cluster sid.

providerType.Description: The provider type. For example, the value can be SapHana.

prometheusUrl.Description: URL of the Node Exporter endpoint

providerType.Description: The provider type. For example, the value can be SapHana.

hostname.Description: Gets or sets the target virtual machine size.

dbName.Description: Gets or sets the hana database name.

sqlPort.Description: Gets or sets the database sql port.

instanceNumber.Description: Gets or sets the database instance number.

dbUsername.Description: Gets or sets the database user name.

dbPassword.Description: Gets or sets the database password.

dbPasswordUri.Description: Gets or sets the key vault URI to secret with the database password.

dbSslCertificateUri.Description: Gets or sets the blob URI to SSL certificate for the DB.

sslHostNameInCertificate.Description: Gets or sets the hostname(s) in the SSL certificate.

providerType.Description: The provider type. For example, the value can be SapHana.

sapSid.Description: Gets or sets the SAP System Identifier

sapHostname.Description: Gets or sets the target virtual machine IP Address/FQDN.

sapInstanceNr.Description: Gets or sets the instance number of SAP NetWeaver.

sapHostFileEntries.Description: Gets or sets the list of HostFile Entries

sapUsername.Description: Gets or sets the SAP user name.

sapPasswordUri.Description: Gets or sets the key vault URI to secret with the SAP password.

sapClientId.Description: Gets or sets the SAP Client ID.

sapPortNumber.Description: Gets or sets the SAP HTTP port number.

sapSslCertificateUri.Description: Gets or sets the blob URI to SSL certificate for the SAP system.

providerType.Description: The provider type. For example, the value can be SapHana.
